items.name: Fire Red Sport Sneakers
items.description: Bold red sneakers designed for those who love speed and style. Features advanced grip technology.

items.name: Aggressive Black & Red Sneakers
items.description: Dynamic color-block design in black and red. Built for durability and high-impact activities.

items.name: Minimalist White Sport Smartwatch
items.description: Stay connected and track your fitness with this sleek white smartwatch. Features heart rate monitoring, GPS, and a water-resistant design.

items.name: Premium Black Wireless Headset
items.description: Experience high-fidelity sound with these over-ear wireless headphones. Noise-canceling technology and 40-hour battery life.

items.name: Waterproof Bluetooth Earbuds
items.description: Compact and powerful earbuds perfect for the gym or rainy commutes. IPX7 waterproof rating and seamless Bluetooth pairing.

items.name: Ultra HD 4K Camera
items.description: Professional-grade digital camera with 4K video recording, optical stabilization, and advanced autofocus system for stunning visuals.

items.name: Wireless Charging Pad
items.description: Fast 15W wireless charging pad compatible with all Qi-enabled devices. Sleek design with anti-slip surface.

items.name: Premium Bluetooth Speaker
items.description: 360-degree sound with deep bass and crystal-clear treble. Waterproof design perfect for outdoor adventures.

items.name: Gaming Mechanical Keyboard
items.description: RGB backlit mechanical keyboard with customizable switches. Built for competitive gaming with exceptional durability.

items.name: Ergonomic Wireless Mouse
items.description: Comfortable ergonomic design reduces wrist strain. Precision tracking sensor with adjustable DPI settings.

items.name: Portable Power Bank 30000mAh
items.description: High-capacity portable charger with dual USB ports. Charges your devices at lightning-fast speeds.

items.name: 4K Webcam with Microphone
items.description: Crystal-clear 4K streaming quality with built-in noise-canceling microphone. Perfect for streaming and video calls.

items.name: USB-C Multi-Port Hub
items.description: 7-in-1 USB-C hub with HDMI, USB 3.0, and SD card reader. Aluminum construction for durability.

items.name: LED Desk Lamp with USB
items.description: Eye-caring LED lamp with adjustable brightness. Built-in USB port for charging your devices.
